original_text: That promise will be for him and for his descendants after him. They will always be priests. That is because he did not want the people to worship any god except me. He has removed the sin of the Israelites so that I could forgive them.’
korean_text: 그와 그의 후손에게 영원한 제사장 직분의 언약이라 그가 그의 하나님을 위하여 질투하여 이스라엘 자손을 속죄하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: That promise will be for him
and for his descendants after him
That is because he did not want the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 백성을 원하지 않았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: to worship any god except me
sentences.korean_translation: 나 외에 다른 신을 숭배하는 것을

sentences.original_text: He has removed the sin of the Israelites
so that I could forgive them
